long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meowify 🐱 turns every webpage into a cat-friendly zone! With a single click, this extension transforms all the text on any webpage to meow, matching the superior language of our feline overlords. It's purr-fect for enhancing readability, reducing stress, and even making sites more accessible to cats!

Features:
- 🐾 Universal Translation: Converts all English words to "Meow".
- 🐾 One-Click Transformation: Achieve instant purr-fection with just a single click.
- 🐾 Feline Approved: Tested and loved by cats.

Whether you're looking to have a bit of fun or introduce your feline friends to the wonders of the internet, Meowify is your go-to solution. Just click the extension icon to toggle between human and meow language. Easy to install and fun to use — get ready to meowify your browsing experience!

**Note**: Meowify is currently only available in English and may not convert complex technical jargon or special characters.
